patterns.pattern: ^\S+ whips up a raging gale of wind, sending it towards (?<victim>\S+)\.$
^Impossibly fast, \S+ brings a magma-wreathed fist around, driving it straight through the magical shield surrounding (?<victim>\S+) without visible effort\.$
^\S+ conjures a blade of ice and drives it straight through the translucent shield surrounding (?<victim>\S+), the protection exploding in a shower of prismatic shards\.$
^The magical shield surrounding (?<victim>\S+) suddenly shatters for no visible reason, flames spontaneously igniting upon \w+ skin\.$
^\S+ sends myriad russet streams towards (?<victim>\S+), shattering \S+ shield\.$
^\S+'s Baalzadeen stares passively, but powerfully, at (?<victim>\S+)\.$
^\S+'?s? daegger flings itself at (?<victim>\S+)'s translucent shield, piercing through it and causing it to fade\.$
^\S+ unleashe?s? a burst of Shin energy at (?<victim>\S+), tearing apart \w+ translucent shield\.$

^The shadow of \S+ suddenly comes alive, leaping forward to hammer at the magical shield surrounding (?<victim>\S+) in a silent frenzy of blows\. \w+ protection lasts mere moments before exploding in a shower of prismatic shards\.$
^As \S+ speaks a terrible word of power, the magical shield surrounding (?<victim>\S+) shatters into prismatic shards\.$
^\S+ dismissively flicks \w+ tail at (?<victim>\S+), annihilating the magical shield surrounding \w+ with casual ease\.$
^\S+ casts a spell of erosion at (?<victim>\S+)\.$
^Huge boulders hammer at the magical shield surrounding (?<victim>\S+), shattering it in a spray of translucent shards\.$
The end of \S+'s staff smashes the magical shield surrounding (?<victim>\S+) in an explosion of translucent shards\.$
^The magical shield surrounding (?<victim>\S+) explodes into translucent shards without visible reason or cause\.$
